description:
Designed to keep you moving fast and light. This well-ventilated pack has the features of a day pack but in a compact package. It’s hydration-ready so you don’t have to stop and pull out your water bottle on a quick hike, and the suspension system allows flow-through ventilation for a cool, comfortable back. Just enough space to stash your extra layers and snacks to fuel your trail cardio session.

  • Made of 210-denier nylon with a recycled polyester lining
  • FreeSpan suspension system adds ventilation without eating into the volume of the bag
  • Low-profile cushioning keeps the weight tucked close to your lower back for stability and comfort
  • Zippered panel access to main compartment
  • Oversized hipbelt pockets have enough space to fit cell phones and trail essentials
  • Side stretch water bottle pockets, and inner security pocket with key clip
  • Front stretch-mesh pocket for additional on-the-go storage
  • Webbing keepers prevent dangling straps
  • Loops to hold trekking poles and your sunglasses (on the shoulder strap)
  • Inner hydration sleeve includes a 3D Hydro 3L reservoir with SpeedClip hanger system
  • Designed for loads up to 9.0kg
name: Gregory Salvo 16 H2O Daypack - Unisex
